heroku.SETVAR_DESC:
Set config var for Heroku easily.

filters.FILTER_DESC:
Add filter. If person type wetin you set, bot go reply wetin you want. If you type *.filter* only, e go show list.
‚å®Ô∏è Example: .filter ‚Äùhello‚Äù ‚Äùhello#how far?‚Äù
filters.STOP_DESC:
Stop filter wey you add.
‚å®Ô∏è Example: .stop ‚Äùhello‚Äù

greetings.WELCOME_DESC: Set Welcome message. If you no write msg, e go show current one.
greetings.NOT_SET_WELCOME:
‚ö†Ô∏è *You never set Welcome message!*
**To set am:** ```.welcome How far && How far#Wetin dey?```
greetings.NEED_WELCOME_TEXT:
‚ö†Ô∏è *You need write message to set Welcome.*
*Example:* ```.welcome How far && How far#Wetin dey?```
greetings.GOODBYE_DESC: Set Goodbye message. If you no write msg, e go show current one.
greetings.NOT_SET_GOODBYE:
‚ö†Ô∏è *You never set Goodbye message!*
*To set am:* ```.goodbye Later && Later#Bye```
greetings.NEED_GOODBYE_TEXT:
‚ö†Ô∏è *You need write message to set Goodbye.*
